cab.content: BATTLE SITUATION - EVENING - 9th mm, 1918.1. The Germans continue to press their attack between MO'KT'DIDI'.i.'-H and NOYOH with great vigour but the French main line of resistance is still intact, Our line is approx-imately DOMELIEN - LE FRETOY - LE. PLOYRON - COURCELLES.-RESSONS-SUR-JIATZ - North of I-IAREOIL-LAMOTTE - South of PIEMOME - along the RIVER DIVETTE.On the remainder of the French Front there is nothing to report.2, On the British Front the situation remains unchanged.General Staff,War Office, S/.U1.9th June, 1918,Issued at 6 .15 p .m.
